title: Using Electronic Health Record Metadata to Understand Clinician Work and Behavior
details: A Jay Holmgren, B Steitz, S Lou, N Apathy - … Clinical Workflow in the Digital and AI …, 2025
abstract: Electronic health records (EHR) have become a central feature of care delivery in the United States over the past decade. While the value of clinical data stored within EHRs has long been recognized as transformational for research and operational …
